nodes.bodyText: Should we move MAX_FIRST_EXPONENT_BYTES, GQUADDIVISOR and MAX_GAS_BITS to the Byzantium gas calculator?  Looks like they are used only in gas calculation.  BASE_OFFSET needs to stay, however.
We should also consider all methods that were made public to be migrated to the gas calculator.  Some of them are used in the calculation so they should stay.
